name: My Turn: Infinite Magic Duel
description:
The annual best real-time cards duel game is here. Download and play it now!

The most innovative cards gameplay, the most passionate duels.
36 heroes vary in 5 hero classes. They are waiting for you!
Win in duels, with 100 ever-shifting cards and masterful strategies!
7-min ultimate combat. Ready for your glory!
1V1 cards battle, dominate global challenger!

The door of My Turn tavern is always open for you. Adventurous duels are everywhere. Watch out for the spells and the magic ultimate skill!

You will never worry about the Tavern surroundings, as it won’t be strange for you. Assemble your cards deck with your favorite 4 champions and join in the epic duels at once!

Simple and pure, you will feel the charm of cards duel and use your tactics to create infinite possibilities!

Wherever you go, My Turn will be with you.

ALL DATA WILL BE KEPT AFTER THIS TEST.


FEATURES

• Masterful strategies, insanely fun.

100 cards for your strategy show. Nothing is gonna stop you!

• Build you ever-shifting decks with ease.

Use 4 hero cards, 4 equipment cards, 2 item cards. That is your mighty deck!

• Reverse your turn with cards.

Fabulous experience of playing cards. Fight for your glory in one turn!

• PVP globally. Who wins, who gets rewarded!

Win your victory with players worldwide. That is the best moment!

• Duel with friends. That is the social pleasure!

Make friends in a duel. No longer lonely in several min.

• Collect and create your unique cards deck!

Collect and exchange cards! Unlock more heroes! Powerful deck are yours!

My Turn is a free to download and play mobile game (TCG, CCG), while some game items can be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings. According to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download My Turn.

If you encounter any issue in-game, kindly follow our official Facebook Fanpgae and leave your message for your puzzle, and you will get immediate reply.
